## Brief explanation of Code and implementation

![alt text](data:image/png;base64,)
#### Here V is the utiltity function and s is the present State with previous State s'
## For Task 1
For the trace of the state,  with the chosen action at that state and the value of state
for all iterations from 0 till convergence.
 + It took 17 Iterations to converge
 + The alogrithm was not risk seeking and stuck(where ever) mostly on the North, West, South  positions, since there was no probaility of MM atack and neagtive reward.
 + When ever there were no arrows or materials, the algorithm chose to Move or stay depending on positon rather than gather, craft or hit
 + It came to Centre and East mostly when MM was only in Dormant state.
#
### For Starting State=(W,0,0,R,100)
(W,0,0,D,100)Right(E,0,0,R,100)
(E,0,0,R,100)Stay(E,0,0,R,50)
(E,0,0,R,50)Stay(E,0,0,D,75)
(E,0,0,D,75)Left(C,0,0,D,75)
(C,0,0,D,75)Down(S,0,0,D,75)
(S,0,0,D,75)Gather(S,1,0,R,75)
(S,1,0,R,75)Up(S,1,0,D,100)
(S,1,0,D,100)Up(C,1,0,D,100)
(C,1,0,D,100)Hit(C,1,0,D,50)
(C,1,0,R,50)Hit(C,1,0,R,50)
(C,1,0,R,50)Up(N,1,0,R,50)
(N,1,0,R,50)Stay(N,1,0,D,50)
(N,1,0,D,50)Craft(N,0,2,D,50)
(N,0,2,D,50)Down(E,0,2,D,50)
(E,0,2,D,50)Shoot(E,0,1,D,25)
(E,0,1,D,25)Left(C,0,1,R,25)
(C,0,1,R,25)Left(C,0,0,D,50)
(C,0,0,D,50)Down(S,0,0,D,50)
(S,0,0,D,50)Gather(S,1,0,D,50)
(S,1,0,D,50)Up(E,1,0,D,50)
(E,1,0,D,50)Hit(E,1,0,R,50)
(E,1,0,R,50)Hit(E,1,0,R,0)
+ When ever state has neither arrows nor material, There is high probaility to definite probaility that action would be a move action(Up,Left Right,Down) or Stay action
+ And when MM is in dormant state, then success of gather, craft becomes reasonable
+ Since State value would be decreased for cases of East or Centre Position when MM is Ready, they have lesser probailities.  
### For Starting State=(C,2,0,R,100)
(C,2,0,R,100)Up(N,2,0,R,100)
(N,2,0,R,100)Craft(N,2,0,D,100)
(N,2,0,R,100)Stay(N,2,0,D,100)
(N,2,0,D,100)Craft((N,1,1,D,100)
(N,1,1,D,100)Craft(N,0,2,D,100)
(N,0,2,D,100)Down(C,0,2,D,100)
(C,0,2,D,100)Shoot(C,0,1,R,75)
(C,0,1,R,75)Left(W,0,1,R,75)
(W,0,1,R,75)Shoot(W,0,0,R,50)
(W,0,0,R,50)Stay(W,0,0,D,50)
(W,0,0,D,50)Stay(W,0,0,D,50)
(W,0,0,D,50)Right(C,0,0,D,50)
(C,0,0,D,50)Hit(C,0,0,D,50)
(C,0,0,D,50)Stay(C,0,0,D,50)
(C,0,0,D,50)Down(S,0,0,D,50)
(S,0,0,D,50)Gather(S,0,0,R,50)
(S,0,0,R,50)Gather(S,1,0,R,50)
(S,1,0,R,50)Stay(S,1,0,D,50)
(S,1,0,D,50)Stay(E,1,0,D,50)
(E,1,0,D,50)Hit(E,1,0,D,0)
+ Here, whenever materials or arrwos are high in number, they move to respective positions of craft or shoot, dependign also on MM state.
+ And Since changes for doing less rewarding tasks are also less, there is no much risk involved
+ So IJ tries to avoid MM attack as much as possible while taking any high probability chance of killing MM.
## For Task 2
### Case 1:
##### Indiana now on the LEFT action at East Square will go to the West Square. 
+ The Iteration to converge increased to 20
+ The probability for killing MM deacreased and iterations increased since East position would not lead to Centre position which had higher probability of successfully shooting an arrow (0.5) than in West(0.25)
+ Increase in shoot, hit especially from ability to being attacked states increased(East, Centre), showing risk seeking nature.
### Case 2:
##### The step cost of the STAY action is now zero. 
+ This case took infinite iterations to converge(printed only 50/51 to save time)
+ The preferred action of East position increased with more probaility to move left, over shoot and hit, since the cost for doing it decreased. 
+ A reason for infinite iteration may be that the stay probaility was 1, arrows had low probability of hitting in West and deceased in arrows with no means to craft, and  hence decreasing of MM's health was rare.
### Case 3:
##### Change the value of gamma to 0.25 
+ Here the iterations for convergence deacreased(15/16) compared to in Task 1 as well.
+ There was an increase in number of times actions shoot, hit and gather were performed because the risk of negative reward is decreased with gamma, where ever these functions are performed 
+ And since all these functions are directly aimed to and provide for decreasing MM's health, the iterations needed are less.
